alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:49AM PST until February 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total new snow accumulations of 8 to 20 inches by late Sunday afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area and Cascade mountains of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, White Pass and Paradise on Mount Rainier. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
